Engineering Student in Faculty of Engineering, Ainshams University, Computer and Systems Department
It was passion for me to be a Computer Engineer, I found Software Development, Embedded systems and Artificial intelligence(AI) the most interesting fields for me.
I always want to impress people than being myself impressed,I believe that hard working and god blessing are the keys for success, So I Always try to do my best to achieve my goals,My Dream to be one of the few people who Makes a great impact on our future
